column4: anyone want to tray and make ubuntu mount a hard drive?  just like this: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/302960
ubuntu 2.6.24-22-generic works fine but 2.6.27-11-generic will not mount the drive !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
please someone must know what is stopping the new ubuntu from mounting drives
Are those ntfs or fat32 partitions you are trying to mount
I shreded and tried all kinds of partition tables
People using ubuntu seldom have issues mounting partitions
I know and like i said it works fine on one box but not on the other
I assume it is an external and ubuntu is the os on both systems
only sda* not sdb* on the new box
I assume this is a usb external
If it's a USB device, run 'tail -f /var/log/syslog' to see what the system does when you plug the device in
nope, still trying to get some work done
ok thanks for the time I'll downgrade for now :(
